full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM GYI GTZO BO RNAM GSUM GYI RNAM BSHAD GSUNG RAB KUN GYI GNAD BSDUS PA LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @057A *, ,CES LAM GYI GTZO BO RNAM GSUM GYI RNAM BSHAD GSUNG RAB KUN GYI GNAD BSDUS PA LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, THOS BSAM GLING PA'I SLOB DPON LUNG RIGS SMRA BA 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS 'PHEL GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O, DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
